td.content: s:patient presents with 2 years history of moderate reduced peripheral vision. she is a 42 YO female. drinks daily denies any smoking o:Height 64 in, Weight 121 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 93, SystolicBP 117, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, and ordered contrast sensitivity testing.

s:pt presents with moderate reduced peripheral vision, moderate progressive blurred vision in both eyes and moderate photophobia. These symptoms are present for about 5 weeks. pt is a white female aged 44 Ys. Denies ever using tobacco describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 2 years in her past o:Height 63 in, Weight 120 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

td.content: s:pt presents with moderate progressive blurred vision in both eyes x 12 days. pt also complains of moderate photophobia, moderate reduced peripheral vision. pt is a 44 yr old F skydiver. o:Height 63 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered contrast sensitivity testing.
